name: Merrenoloth
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Magic Resistance: The merrenoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Magic Weapons: The merrenoloth's weapon attacks are magical.
traits.Teleport: As a bonus action, the merrenoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.Multiattack: The merrenoloth uses Fear Gaze once and makes one oar attack.
actions.Oar: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.Fear Gaze: The merrenoloth targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 13+1d4 + 11 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions: A strong wind propels the ship, increasing its speed by 30 feet until initiative count 20 on the next round.

The air within 60 feet of the ship is filled with howling wind. Until initiative count 20 on the next round, that area is difficult terrain, and when a Medium or smaller creature flies into that area or starts its turn flying there, it must succeed on a DC 13+1d4 + 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
